attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: is it not time to end the greed of mps and start by stopping second home payments when our young people cant afford a first home please sign this petition to show we want an end to money grabbing mps who rob us blind then line there pockets

rejection.details:
Your title is not a call for action. Also similar to:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPs-accountable/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/mpscomps/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
